Package it.unipd.dei.webapp.leoforfriends.servlet

Manages the Web application (controller and view)

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDatabaseServlet
    Manages the connections to the data source
    AuthenticationServlet
    Verifies whether the client has the authorization to view the selected content
    CreateAnswerServlet
    Creates an answer into the database.
    CreateQuestionServlet
    Creates a new question into the database.
    LoginServlet
    Authenticates an user.
    LogoutServlet
    Logs out the user.
    ModifyPictureServlet
    Modifies an user.
    ModifyUserServlet
    Modifies an user.
    RegistrationServlet
    Creates a new user into the database.
    RemovePictureServlet
    Modifies an user.
    RestManagerServlet
    Manages the REST API for the different REST resources.
    SearchQuestionLoggedServlet
    Retrieves from the Database all the questions inserted by a single user
    SearchQuestionServlet
    Retrieves from the Database all the questions inserted by a single user
